definition: to wind/to tighten/crescent moon/first quarter or waxing moon
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: My watch needs winding every day.
sentences.chinese: 我的手錶需要每天上弦。

sentences.english: Explanation: On February 2nd, a first quarter Moon shone in planet Earth's early evening sky.
sentences.chinese: 2月2日，一輪上弦月閃爍在地球夜晚的天空中。

sentences.english: I forgot to wind my watch last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上我的表忘了上弦了。

sentences.english: This is a new type of self-winding watch.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種新款的自動上弦手錶。

sentences.english: She looked ashamed ashamed stars, also forget the moon light leaning willow.
sentences.chinese: 她望羞了星星，也忘羞了上弦月輕倚柳梢頭。

sentences.english: The Moon full of Light in Conjunction with Mars, makes the Native to be counted a fool;
sentences.chinese: 火星與上弦月合相，命主會被人爲是傻瓜。

sentences.english: For hearts cut off, should look at the rubber winding.
sentences.chinese: 欲知心斷絕，應看膠上弦。

sentences.english: Top chords of Pyay Irrawaddy River Bridge in Myanmar are of steel box members.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸卑謬依諾瓦底江大橋的上弦杆爲鋼箱杆件。

sentences.english: Inside the watch is a Swiss manually wound mechanical movement.
sentences.chinese: 手錶內部是瑞士手工生產的上弦機械機芯。

sentences.english: The moon is now at the first quarter phase.
sentences.chinese: 月亮現在處在上弦位相。

sentences.english: The machine makes use of a saddles bumping upwards and downwards for automatic winding up.
sentences.chinese: 該機利用鞍座上下顛波自動上弦。

sentences.english: A first-quarter moon is halfway between new moon and full moon .
sentences.chinese: 上弦月是新月和滿月的中間狀態。

definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]
to pull out/to pull a lever
to adjust to the right value/to tune/to focus (a camera etc)/to set (the date, the time) to the correct value
to bend the body at the waist/to bow
